snippet.title: Magic Ball Deluxe (PC 2004) - Full Game 1080p60 Walkthrough + Bonus Levels - No Commentary
snippet.description:
Includes the full game: all 150 levels of the Original Level Pack and all 50 levels of the Bonus Level Pack, recorded with Elgato HD60, without commentary.

If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

Played this a lot as kid. Played its sequels even more. They're simple but great fun! Pure nostalgia.

Magic Ball Deluxe Franchise (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-6T0hkmhrUd5aoQBQdZKn-

---More casual games on my channel---
Feeding Frenzy (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-vTnyrKVKX5mtVHgV3zBW1
Feeding Frenzy 2: Shipwreck Showdown (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_1PbRkvjCHEmFeMBMaWgLA
Delicious Franchise playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-kdh5jmx8coHsMHsgyCDRJ
Cake Mania Franchise playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9Jwfp0ztIbJK5qF3RvdGKe
Insaniquarium Deluxe playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-Kvrg1UXYftFvmLYagiHOt
Hidden Object games playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_k3yshSXvA9-1KM-6YJ58R
Da Vinci's Secret playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-4xyfk7PBM6XEP-p9umcCO
5 Spots playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_1v24lGWrpo6lQGE1pMWaK
Plants vs. Zombies (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9PfRnZKsV2GxYq_du5Zo5X
Noah's Ark Deluxe (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf8L0axujmy3Q4P7qncvO405
Bookworm Deluxe (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf8I_H7LtoC6dFfe_cMctdB1
The Wonderland Trilogy playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9lVbyWiGn2tNmsowfSWTZf

Story: Magic Ball is a 3D Breakout variant where the player controls a ball with a paddle and needs to break all the blocks in order to go to the next level. If the ball falling from the paddle, the player loses a life. There are power-ups that help to the player (like extra life, weapons to break blocks easily, increase and reduce paddle and more).

The 3D is for the perspective, which is rotatable horizontal and vertical, but it also relates to the level structure, which is multi-layer. You always play at the ground layer, but as soon as the brick there is destroyed, any brick of a higher layer will fall down.

The game offers a basic level pack and three bonus packs, all totaling in 200 levels.

There are a lot of power-ups in the game, ranging from very good to very bad. For example: paddle shrinker and expander, slow ball & fast ball, magnetic paddle, multiball, fireball (ignites adjacent bricks), the all destroying ball, many different weapons for the paddle (gun, rockets, chemical rockets, etc.), Earthquake (will shake the screen), Level Skipper, Death "power-up" (will instantly kill the paddle), Day & Night power-ups, and many more.

The weapon power-ups wearing not just off when you collect another power-up, but they also have only a limited ammunition. In example, the conventional rockets have an ammunition of 3 rockets, so you can't blow up the entire level with them.

Release Dates -  ~2004
Genre - Arcade, Paddle / Pong
Platforms - Windows
Developer - Dream Dale
Publisher - Alawar Entertainment, Inc., Big Fish Games

My Xbox gamertag: Shad0wx54x
My PlayStation gamertag: ToughGamingGuyYT

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy/playlists
